title: Waco Mammoth National Monument: Kids & Youth
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth       Waco Mammoth National Monument has lots of fun and educational activities for kids. Complete these at the Monument, or print them at home. Science is FUN!       Coloring Pages  Color by Numbers Mammoth in Texas  Activities   Mammoth Trumpet Word Search (primary age)  Keep checking back. More fun activities sheets to come!          Excavation Station             Everyone gets to dig at the Waco Mammoth National Monument! Check in at the Welcome Center for rules and information. Please dig carefully because our replica Ice Age fossils are fragile, and no, you don't get to keep what you find. Public free dig is available during regular operating hours, weather permitting, and excluding times that the Excavation Station may be reserved (fee applies) for special occasions.      Junior Ranger Program Coming soon! –Our Junior Ranger Program at the Waco Mammoth National Monument is currently in development. Please check back later.
